meanings.sent1: The unmanaged garden grew wild with weeds.
meanings.sent2: The unmanaged children ran around the playground unsupervised.
meanings.sent3: The unmanaged chaos of the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unmanaged hair was a tangle of knots and curls.
meanings.sent5: The unmanaged forest was a dense thicket of trees and undergrowth.

meanings.definition: Not handled or dealt with efficiently
meanings.sent1: The unmanaged project fell behind schedule quickly.
meanings.sent2: The unmanaged emails piled up in his inbox.
meanings.sent3: The unmanaged situation turned into a comedy of errors.
meanings.sent4: His unmanaged finances were a mess of unpaid bills.
meanings.sent5: The unmanaged workload overwhelmed her with tasks left undone.
